banner.title: front-end
banner.subtitle: web developer
banner.description: Hello there! I'm Yeris, and I am a passionate front-end web developer with a deep love for crafting captivating digital experiences. My journey in the world of web development has led me to master a diverse array of front end web tools and technologies.

contact.title: contact me!
contact.text: If you're looking for a front-end web developer who is equally comfortable with JavaScript wizardry, HTML artistry, CSS elegance, PHP magic, WordPress wizardry, and REST API mastery, then look no further. I'm excited to bring my passion, skills, and creativity to the table, creating experiences that resonate and leave a lasting impact. Feel free to reach out, and let's collaborate to turn your digital dreams into reality. Together, we can sculpt a digital world that's as functional as it is beautiful.
